metadata.synopsis: Default Dialogs for Baldur's Mouth Guard 03
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guards in the Writing Room

0.speaker: Guard Hertvor Dremble
0.text: You ever heard of this many guards for a bloody broadsheet? It's ridiculous.

1.speaker: Guard Hertvor Dremble
1.text: Bloody writers. If the pen really were mightier than the sword, they wouldn't need us.
